content.rendered:
Easily visible screening even in a bright room

  • No need of light bulb replacement; Maintenance-free
  • Switchable between normal mode and much brighter boost mode
  • Helps the accurate diagnosis of the astigmatic axis
  • The beam can be turned 360 degrees steplessly
  • The anti-reflection filter provides a brighter and wider field of view
  • Durable life with two C-size batteries

excerpt.rendered: Easily visible screening even in a bright room
